messages.subject: (no subject)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/19/02 8:46:02 AM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/19/02 8:46:02 AM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< My daughter, however, had no problem making that
transission. As soon as she turned 18, she quit asking permission and just
started announcing that she was going to do something or go somewhere. >>

Hmmmmm...my kids have already made THAT transition!!!!
My 12 y.o. left me a note a couple weeks ago....it detailed where he was
going (to Toys-R-Us) how he was getting there (on his bike) and when he would
be home (an hour).
He went shopping and came back when he was done.
I thanked him for leaving a detailed note so I wouldn't worry.
I think that is the great thing about unschooling....they don't have to make
unecessary transitions at 18.
Ren
